main event: A bright white object rose rapidly at a 45-degree angle, hovered, and then disappeared over Atlanta, GA.
interesting points: The object was in sight for about five minutes.,The observation was recorded at 10/0535Z on November 15, 1957.,The report included comments stating that investigators could not definitely identify the sighting as an aircraft.,The object was classified as possibly a balloon, although other options were noted.,The length of observation was recorded as 7-8 minutes.
sighted object: one bright white object in the sky
